If you are saving your download history, you can resume the download from where it left off.

alldl_caution_msg.message:
Attention:
If your browser is set to confirm the save location every time a file is downloaded, a dialog asking to specify the destination may appear for each download, potentially making it impossible to stop the process midway. Please check your browser and extension settings, and if there are no issues, press the OK button to start the download.

select_mat.message: Checks if the specified string is included in the target string. (Example: ?mat{'?tags?','æ¼«ç”»','manga','not manga'}? outputs "manga" if "æ¼«ç”»" is included in ?tags?. If not, it outputs "not manga"ï¼‰

select_mat_str.message: ?mat{'string to check','string to search','if the string is included','if the string is not included'}?

select_mozi.message: The string to be added only to the individual file names (excluding the ZIP file name) when saving manga or multiple illustrations (e.g., ?[Page]? or ?[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_a.message: The string to be added only when saving AI-generated works (e.g., ?a[AI Work]? or ?a[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_i.message: The string to be added only when saving standard illustrations (e.g., ?i[Illustration]? or ?i[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_m.message: The string to be added only when saving manga or multiple illustrations (e.g., ?m[Manga]? or ?m[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_n.message: The string to be added only when saving novels (e.g., ?n[Novel]? or ?n[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_o.message: The string to be added only when saving original works (e.g., ?o[Original Work]? or ?o[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_r.message: The string to be added only when saving R-18 works (e.g., ?r[R-18 Work]? or ?r[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_mozi_u.message: The string to be added only when saving Ugoira (animated illustrations) (e.g., ?u[Ugoira]? or ?u[?pixiv-id?]?)

select_novel_rtime_min.message: Reading time in minutes (displayed only for novels)

select_novel_rtime_sec.message: Reading time in seconds (displayed only for novels)

select_page.message: Page No. (Display only for comics. Consecutive numbers start from 1.)

select_page_all.message: Total number of pages (Display only for comics)

select_page_original.message: Page No. (Display only for comics. Consecutive numbers start from 0.)

select_page_zeroformat.message: Page No. (Display only for comics. Set 0 at the start when many of pages. Consecutive numbers start from 1.)

select_page_zeroformat_original.message: Page No. (Display only for comics. Set 0 at the start when many of pages. Consecutive numbers start from 0.)

select_reg.message: Replace a string with a regular expression. Optional modifier can be left blank. (Example : ?reg{'?tags?','æ¼«ç”»','manga','g'}? replaces "æ¼«ç”»" in ?tags? with "manga")

select_reg_str.message: ?reg{'string to replace','regular expression','replaced string','optional modifier(can be blank)'}?

select_regmat.message: Checks with a regular expression if the entered string contains the specified string. Optional modifier can be left blank. (Example: ?regmat{'?tags?','æ¼«ç”»','manga','not manga',''}? outputs "manga" if "æ¼«ç”»" is included in ?tags?. If not, it outputs "not manga"ï¼‰

select_regmat_str.message: ?regmat{'string to check','regular expression','if the string is included','if the string is not included','optional modifier(can be blank)'}?

select_rep.message: Replace a string. (Example : ?rep{'?tags?','æ¼«ç”»','manga'}? replaces "æ¼«ç”»" in ?tags? with "manga") *Supports partial replacement using '$$1'.

tokusyu.message:
--Special substitution character list--
?caption?:Caption
?caption-html?:Caption using HTML tag
?comment?:Comments
?comment-rep?:Comments (including replies)
?comment-csv?:Comments (output in CSV format)
?comment-repcsv?:Comments (including replies)(output in CSV format)
All tags that can use in file name are available.
